General.title: Discord Webhook Username Fix Guide
General.description: Discord API restriction: Webhook usernames cannot contain the word "discord" anywhere in the username field. This applies to: 1. **Code-level username** (in payload) - ✅ FIXED 2. **Discord webhook settings username** - ⚠️ NEEDS MANUAL UPDATE

metadata.status: Code fix complete, Discord settings fix needed

Websites.title: TradingRobotPlug.com Template Loading Fix
Websites.description: The `template_include` filter in `inc/template-helpers.php` was intercepting template loading but didn't explicitly handle `is_front_page()` or `is_home()`. While it should have worked (by returning the original template), the lack of explicit handling could cause issues.

Websites.title: TradingRobotPlug.com Template Loading Fix - Status Report
Websites.description: WordPress uses this priority order: 1. **front-page.php** - Highest priority (static front page) ✅ 2. **home.php** - Blog posts index 3. **index.php** - Fallback template The `template_include` filter intercepts template loading but should allow WordPress hierarchy to work.

metadata.status: ✅ **FIXED** - Template loading issue resolved, ready for deployment

Websites.description: 1. Navigate to: **Settings > Reading** in WordPress admin 2. Check **"Your homepage displays"** setting: ```bash wp option get show_on_front wp option get page_on_front ``` ```sql SELECT option_value FROM wp_options WHERE option_name = 'show_on_front';

Trading.title: TradingRobotPlug Phase 2 Deployment Readiness Assessment
Trading.description: Phase 2 implementation is **deployment-ready** with minimal WordPress integration changes required. The backend components (database persistence, strategy plugin loading, async broker methods) are self-contained and can be deployed independently. WordPress plugin requires **minor REST API endpoint additions** to expose Phase 2 functionality.

Trading.title: TradingRobotPlug Phase 3 Deployment Readiness Assessment
Trading.description: Phase 3 introduces event-driven architecture, real-time streaming, and FastAPI integration. This assessment coordinates deployment readiness between Phase 2 completion ✅ and Phase 3 implementation. **WordPress plugin integration** requires WebSocket client coordination, REST API endpoint updates, and dashboard real-time updates.
